question: 資金
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>resources</kanji> of <kanji>gold</kanji> that we have are our current <vocabulary>funds</vocabulary>. If the resources include a lot of gold, then we have a lot of funds. If they don't, then we don't have a lot of funds.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
